word: Unite With Confidence in One Another. It is not in accordance with the mind of the Lord to encourage suspicion, jealousy, envy, and evil surmising. The Lord desires His people to unite and to look constantly to Jesus. They are to work in sympathy and love, with entire confidence in one another. Christ declares, "All ye are brethren."--Letter 116, 1901, p. 3. (To Elder W. M. Healey, August 21, 1901.)
